Container.Name: Joomla
Container.Overview: Joomla! is a free, open-source Content Management System (CMS) used to build and manage websites and powerful online applications without needing extensive coding. It's known for its flexibility, extensibility with thousands of free extensions and templates, and strong community, making it suitable for everything from personal blogs to complex corporate sites, and it supports multiple languages natively.
Container.Requires: Needs a database service (MySQL or PGSQL). This is not included and must be set up separetly.

Config.Name: Database Host
Config.Description: Fill with IP or hostname of the database host

Config.Name: Database User
Config.Description: Fill with database user name to connect with database server

Config.Name: Database Password
Config.Description: Fill with database password to connect with database server

Config.Name: Database Name
Config.Description: Database name in database server. If the Database Name specified in this parameter does not already exist on the given Database server, it will be created automatically upon startup of the joomla container, provided that the JOOMLA_DB_USER specified has the necessary permissions to create it.

Config.Name: Database Type
Config.Description: Database type. Options must be mysqli or pgsql.

Config.Name: Administrator Email
Config.Description: Email address of the Joomla administrator

Config.Name: Administrator Name
Config.Description: Full name of the Joomla administrator
